CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: 2a Here we report another novel sidechain D-A conjugated copolymer ( PBDT-TDPP-S ) for highperformance PSCs , in which the BDT and thiophene units are conjugatedly formed the main chain and the di(thiophen-2yl)pyrrolo [3,4-c]pyrrole-1,4(2H,5H)-dione ( TDPP ) units are pended onto the thiophenyl units to build the side chain by a linkage of a 2-vinylthiophenyl unit.

Let's think step by step.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| PBDT-TDPP-S |
| BDT units |
| thiophene units |
| di(thiophen-2yl)pyrrolo [3,4-c]pyrrole-1,4(2H,5H)-dione ( TDPP ) |
| 2-vinylthiophenyl unit |

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material name" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| PBDT-TDPP-S |
| TDPP |

The other entities in the paragraph do not clearly refer to material names. They describe the structure or function of the materials mentioned.

Note: "high-performance PSCs" is not considered a material property, but rather a property of the PBDT-TDPP-S material. Therefore, it is not included in the table.

Paragraph: 2a Here we report another novel sidechain D-A conjugated copolymer ( PBDT-TDPP-S ) for highperformance PSCs , in which the BDT and thiophene units are conjugatedly formed the main chain and the di(thiophen-2yl)pyrrolo [3,4-c]pyrrole-1,4(2H,5H)-dione ( TDPP ) units are pended onto the thiophenyl units to build the side chain by a linkage of a 2-vinylthiophenyl unit.

Let's think step by step.

| Property Value               |
|-----------------------------|
| PBDT-TDPP-S                |
| BDT units                   |
| thiophene units             |
| main chain                  |
| TDPP units                  |
| side chain                  |
| di(thiophen-2yl)pyrrolo [3,4-c]pyrrole-1,4(2H,5H)-dione ( TDPP ) |
| 2-vinylthiophenyl unit     |
| linkage                    |

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Value of material property" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value".

These entities refer to the material properties of the copolymer PBDT-TDPP-S, specifically the TDPP units, the 2-vinylthiophenyl unit, and the linkage between them.
